title: How to Clean Your Triton Tank

steps.headline: Fill a bowl or your sink with a good amount of warm water.
Remove the mouthpiece to prepare the Triton Tank for cleaning.
Remove the atomizer coil by simply unscrewed the post in the middle of the tank.
Dip the mouthpiece, tank, and the atomizer coil post inside your bowl or sink with warm water.
Shake all the parts inside the water to wash off the excess e-liquid and follow up by rinsing them under running warm water again.
steps.description: Ensure there is no e-liquid left on the wicks.

steps.headline: Try to shake off excess water and blow into the tank to help remove the excess.
steps.description: Dry both the atomizer coil and the female connecting end of the Triton tank with paper towels.

steps.headline: Let air dry on a towel or paper towels for about 1 full hour to ensure they are dry.
steps.description: It is very important that they dry completely before use, for faster results, use a blow dryer at low heat or cool temperature.

steps.headline: Once all the parts are nicely dry, re-attach them and you are ready to fill the tank with new e-liquid flavor.
Add the e-liquid to the tank and ensure you do not drop it over the center atomizer coil post, adding the drops around it instead.
steps.description: This will ensure the vaporizing is optimal.

text: Fill a bowl or your sink with a good amount of warm water.  Remove the mouthpiece to prepare the Triton Tank for cleaning.  Remove the atomizer coil by simply unscrewed the post in the middle of the tank.  Dip the mouthpiece, tank, and the atomizer coil post inside your bowl or sink with warm water.  Shake all the parts inside the water to wash off the excess e-liquid and follow up by rinsing them under running warm water again. Ensure there is no e-liquid left on the wicks. Try to shake off excess water and blow into the tank to help remove the excess. Dry both the atomizer coil and the female connecting end of the Triton tank with paper towels. Let air dry on a towel or paper towels for about 1 full hour to ensure they are dry. It is very important that they dry completely before use, for faster results, use a blow dryer at low heat or cool temperature. Once all the parts are nicely dry, re-attach them and you are ready to fill the tank with new e-liquid flavor.  Add the e-liquid to the tank and ensure you do not drop it over the center atomizer coil post, adding the drops around it instead. This will ensure the vaporizing is optimal.
